Title: Yennai Arindhaal
Writer: Thiagarajan Kumararaja, Gautham Menon, Shridhar Raghavan
Actors: Ajith Kumar, Arun Vijay, Trisha Krishnan, Anushka Shetty
Plot: Sathyadev, a sincere police officer, tries to stop an organ trafficking racket. But he is unaware that the man performing the illegal trade is the same person who killed his beloved.
